      • addTabForDrawPanel

        private void addTabForDrawPanel(javax.swing.JPanel drawPanel,
                                java.lang.String fullName,
                                java.lang.String displayName)
        Adds a new Tab for the specified JPanel.

        Note: The full path name us used as tool tip for the tab. (This can be used later to determine the current active file.)
        Parameters:
        drawPanel - The draw panel
        fullName - The full path name of the PNML file. (Intended to be the modelName of the draw panel!)
        displayName - The title of the tab (= the file name)
